content:
Hi #EBMonFHIR
a new community will join this group: HL7 Germany. Great work!
@Brian Alper , @Harold Solbrig , I am seeing quite a few changes in this that appear completely unrelated to the Evidence changes, so I'm very concerned about merging it.
According to github, the fhir-1 branch is 295 commits behind HL7 master, you need to pull latest and sync before we can be confident we can merge this.
